name: Hentai Zodiac Puzzle 2
description:
Hentai Zodiac Puzzle 2 is the awesome sequel of the puzzle with 12 new beautiful girls. Even more differences and music awaits you! Choose your new zodiac girl!
Middle-click to minimize the game. Features: More 12 unique nude girls;
Each girl includes 4 stages;
Gallery of characters;
Nice original artwork;
Steam achievements;
Play with one hand ( ͡~ ͜ʖ ͡°)
